name: Tints of Black (early access)
description:
Shay Foster just tries to get by in high school in a small town in Texas, but it's easy to be a target to bullying when she sticks out as a goth. But if she thought her luck was bad before, she's in for an even bigger surprise, when she and five of her main bullies get attacked and kidnapped by a serial killer family right outside of her prom. Faced with moral dilemmas and depressive thoughts, how shall Shay push on?

WARNING: foul language, violence, and explicit themes and topics such as torture, suicide, depression, and abuse.

-THIS GAME IS AN EARLY ACCESS FOR THE NANORENO GAME JAM AND NOT THE FULL/FINAL VERSION-

What is missing from the early access build: -digital CGs -complete sprites -murder route -voice acting (-debating if I'll keep the placeholder background images or make my own)

{NOTES: I wrote, drew, edited, and coded everything with the help of Ren'Py. I made most of the original music through GarageBand.}
